title: Who is the best living prime minister in the World? - Quora

Many people will not like it that I am not taking Narendra Modi’s name here. But, I think Canadian Prime minister Justin Trudeau is best PM alive.  He is cool charming, handsome , witty moreover he is acceptable to people from all backgrounds regardless of their social , political or economic status. He recognizes everyone's contribution towards the development of the nation. He connects with public very well . He respects all cultural belief and time and again have proved it. He is a progressive leader. In a time when most nations have leadership which support ultra- aggressive nationalism, he is torch bearer of global harmony. He's combating climate change and promoting clean energy practices — 81% of Canada's electricity is already provided by hydroelectric, solar, wind, and nuclear power. He signed the Paris Agreement in 2016. When he was sworn is as the 23rd prime minister, he established a diverse cabinet with an equal number of men and women. When asked to explain why, he said, "Because it's 2015." He has repeatedly called himself a feminist. "If you’re a progressive, you really should be a feminist because it’s about equality. It’s about respect. It’s about making the best of the world that we have,” he said. He's fighting to reduce childhood poverty. Trudeau is a progressive leader and isn't afraid of immigration. More than 28,000 Syrian refugees have been welcomed to Canada since November 2015. Recently when POTUS Donald Trump changed internal policies regarding immigrants , he welcomed them with open arm. He doesn't just speak; he acts. Trudeau went to the airport to personally greet refugees arriving in December 2015 and gave them winter coats. He is a family man. He and his wife have 3 children together. Given all the above qualities there is no harm in saying Justin is best PM alive.
